inclusion.criterion: No previous hepatocellular carcinoma (treated or not)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: serious associated short-term life threatening disease (except associated HIV viral infection and the liver disease itself)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: liver focal lesion suggestive of hepatocellular carcinoma
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: inability to regular monitoring, for whatever reason
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis and is being monitored. No previous HCC or guardianship.
